attributes.action: Block the proposed islamic march on wootton bassett.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the Prime minister to block this and any future march in wootton bassett. This is a symbol of the fallen men and women that the country have lost their lives in the fight against terrorism and should be kept for families and the British people to grieve and show their respect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
